message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement closer to my budget?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product and its value. Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am still not able to meet the price of $17,500. I would like to propose $16,000 as a compromise.
